author.name: Samuel Bryan
author.description: The most beneficial public good is a free market job. The most beneficial and moral means of redistribution is a voluntary and peaceful marketplace

wikipedia.title: Kaplan–Meier estimator
wikipedia.summary: The Kaplan–Meier estimator, also known as the product limit estimator, is a non-parametric statistic used to estimate the survival function from lifetime data.

source.description: The World Bank is a United Nations international financial institution that provides loans to developing countries for capital programs. The World Bank is a component of the World Bank Group, and a member of the United Nations Development Group. The World Bank's mission is to end extreme poverty within a generation and boost shared prosperity.
